pr_title: [LW] Test for lock watch updates that are too far behind

timeline.bodyText: Already enforced elsewhere (i.e. must have a snapshot before processing successes), but this is just because we have to handle optionals everywhere.
timeline.author: Jolyon-S
Jolyon-S

timeline.bodyText: Checked that this should get retried both by atlasdb-proxy and atlasdb internally.
timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: You might wanna add a bit more around the "this will be retried and should happen very rarely".
replies.author: jkozlowski
